title: Economic loss, long-run adjustment in PC

content.question: A typical firm in a perfectly competitive constant-cost industry is operating with an economic loss in the short run. When the industry returns to long-run equilibrium, what will happen to the number of firms in the industry, the market price, and the typical firm’s quantity?

choices.label: Number of Firms Market Price Firm’s Quantity Decrease Increase Increase
Number of Firms Market Price Firm’s Quantity Decrease Decrease Increase
Number of Firms Market Price Firm’s Quantity Decrease Increase Decrease
Number of Firms Market Price Firm’s Quantity Increase Increase Decrease
Number of Firms Market Price Firm’s Quantity Increase Decrease Decrease

content.answer: Number of Firms Market Price Firm’s Quantity Decrease Increase Increase
